General.Name: Perfect Group Corp Ltd Class A
General.Description: Perfect Group Corp., Ltd provides manual and electric toothbrushes in the People's Republic of China. It also offers toothpastes, oral care accessories, dental flosses, flossers, interdental brushes, denture tablets products, and personal care and medical wipes, as well as baby wipes and shampoo caps. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Yangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
